mapper.select: select tech_code , tech_name from tbl_tech where tech_code between 1000 and 1009

SELECT tech_code, tech_name FROM ( select rownum AS RNO , tech_code, tech_name from ( SELECT tech_code, tech_name FROM tbl_tech WHERE LOWER(tech_name) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{input_val}) || '%' ORDER BY CASE WHEN LOWER(tech_name) LIKE CONCAT(LOWER(#{input_val}), '%') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, LOWER(tech_name) )V )T WHERE RNO between 1 and 4
